message.body: Is there any way you can pick me up from Philly? Because otherwise ill be stuck there until 9:30 there are no trains
What do you mean there are no trains ???

Stay on the campus honey. Or go the Perlman center (at the hospital ). I can call the campus police ( the men and women who circle around on bikes) to accompany you. Students do that all the time. It is very usual to ask for that. They can accompany you from somewhere on the campus to the station. Do you want that??
Can I go to Maryland with auntie tomorrow?
What about those truffles?? Hellowwwww Where are the truffles? Are they still there? Did Hanna eat them? I want chocolate.
ABSOLUTELY BEST TRUFFLE I 'VE HAD IN MY LIIIIIIIIIFE!!! You are a genius. That's it I am convinced. I am dying from happiness. AAAAAAAA!!!!
MOM I TOLD YOU TO NEVER POST STUFF ON MY FACEBOOK IM GOING TO UNFRIEND YOU SOON
I completely forgot. Please don't. I promise. I won't even like anything that is yours anymore.
